sentences.en: Croatia also has a place in the history of neckwear as the origin of the necktie (cravat).
sentences.cn: 克罗地亚同时也是一个拥有领带历史的国度，它成为领带（领结）的发源地。
他买了一条别致的领带.

sentences.en: He even wore a necktie, a bright bit of ribbon.
sentences.cn: 他甚至还打了条领带, 那是条颜色鲜亮的丝质领带.

sentences.en: He stood in front of the mirror tightening his necktie.
sentences.cn: 他站在镜子前紧他的领带.

sentences.en: Her necktie was in that crumpled , flattered state which time and much wearing impart.
sentences.cn: 她的领带已破缩不堪,用旧了.

sentences.en: I think I stayed half an hour without this necktie.

sentences.en: If I’m the one winning every time I deal, I end up with a Colombian necktie, know what I’m sayin’?
sentences.cn: 如果每次发牌都是我赢的话，我会被他们哥伦比亚人用领带勒死的，你懂我意思吧？

sentences.en: Louis : Well I thought I'd get him a really nice necktie.

sentences.en: May I say how elegant you look with this necktie?
sentences.cn: 我想说您戴这领带真潇洒.

sentences.en: Nick walked in the boardroom sporting an obnoxious necktie.

sentences.en: Really? I should untie the necktie right now.

sentences.en: That necktie is not in accordance with my business suit.

sentences.en: The necktie counter is at the end of this corridor.
sentences.cn: 卖领带的柜台在这走道的最末端.

sentences.en: When we catch that guy, we're going to have a necktie party.
sentences.cn: 我们抓到那个家伙的时候, 大家要对他处以绞刑.

sentences.en: You've got some egg on your necktie.
